title: 1inch Token Surges 58% as Daily Trading Volume Spikes to 20-Month High; Investor Moves $3.7M to Binance
description: The native token of decentralized exchange (DEX) aggregator 1inch (1INCH) has risen by more than 30% in the past 24-hours as trading volume hit $597 million, its highest level since October, 2021.

title: Gnosis Lets Crypto Users Make Everyday Purchases From Wallets With Visa
description: The crypto-based debit card will allow web3 users to use their stablecoins to pay for products in everyday life.

title: 1inch Token Hits 3-Month High Amid Surge in South Korean Trading Volumes
description: The native token powering the 1inch Network has seen a surge in trading volume on South Korean exchange Upbit.

title: Crypto Wallet Provider Gnosis Launches Self-Custodial Debit Card
description: The Gnosis Card lets you pay anywhere that Visa is accepted. And, they're letting other wallets copy their design.

title: Crypto Exchange Binance Finalizes Bitcoin Lightning Network Integration
description: Binance customers can now withdraw and deposit funds via Bitcoinâ€™s Layer-2 scaling solution, the Lightning Network.

title: Lens Protocol V2 launches with focus on open standards, profile switching
description:
At the EthCC conference in Paris, Aave, and Lens Protocol founder Stani Kulechov announced the launch of Lens Protocol V2, emphasizing how open standards and portability can empower users in social media. The need for decentralized social media Kulechov began by discussing how he believes centralized social platforms “lock in users” and their data, limiting […]

title: zkSync unveils Boojum upgrade to enhance Ethereum Layer-2 scaling
description: Matter Labs, the core developer of Ethereum Layer-2 scaling solution zkSync Era, has announced the launch of Boojum, a revolutionary proof system designed to enhance performance and accessibility. Boojum is built on a new Rust-based cryptographic library developed by zkSync, utilizing STARK technology to power the upgraded Zero-Knowledge (ZK) circuits. title: Aave deploys DAI stablecoin competitor on Ethereum
description: Aave has launched its algorithmic stablecoin, GHO, backed by multiple crypto assets, including ethereum (ETH)
